If you're looking for something more psychological, "The Surgeon" might be just the ticket – it's a dark thriller-horror film with intriguing performances from its cast. Enjoy the suspense!

"If you're looking for a thrilling action movie, I'd highly recommend 'Die Hard'. It's about a New York cop who saves his estranged wife during a Christmas party hijack by terrorists, starring the iconic Bruce Willis and Alan Rickman.

Alternatively, if you're interested in a suspenseful thriller, 'When a Stranger Calls' might be up your alley. This film revolves around a high-school student harassed by an anonymous caller during a babysitting job."

I'd highly recommend watching "The Mist" if you enjoy suspenseful thrillers. This film is about a small town under siege by terrifying creatures, forcing a group of survivors to barricade themselves in a supermarket and fight for their lives. Some notable actors included are Andre Braugher, Toby Jones, and Jeffrey DeMunn.

If you're looking for something different but still falls within the thriller genre, "Unleashed" might be an intriguing choice. In this film, a man enslaved by the mob since childhood seeks to escape his captors and start anew while dealing with inner demons and external threats. Notable actors are Bob Hoskins, Vincent Regan, and Jet Li. Enjoy your movie time!

conversation.text:
Based on your preference for thrillers, I'd highly recommend "Waterworld" and "District 9".

In "Waterworld", set in a future with Earth almost entirely submerged, you'll witness a post-apocalyptic adventure filled with drama, action, and intrigue, starring Kevin Costner and Dennis Hopper.

As for "District 9", this film offers an unique blend of science fiction and thriller as it explores the violent consequences when an extraterrestrial race is forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth. Sharlto Copley delivers a captivating performance in this critically acclaimed movie. Enjoy your viewing!

I'd highly recommend watching "The Usual Suspects" if you're interested in a thriller with intriguing twists and turns. The movie revolves around five criminals who are brought together by chance, and Kevin Spacey delivers an outstanding performance as the mysterious Keyser Soze. It's definitely worth checking out!

If you enjoy historical crime dramas, "Public Enemies" is another great choice. This film stars Johnny Depp as notorious gangster John Dillinger and offers a gripping portrayal of the 1930s crime wave in America. I think it would be an engaging watch for you!

This thrilling movie stars Val Kilmer and Michael Douglas as a bridge engineer and an old hunter who face off against two deadly lions in British East Africa. Another intriguing option is "Saw" from 2004, which tells the story of two strangers who wake up with no memory and find themselves trapped in a deadly game. With an engaging plot and strong performances, it's another fascinating thriller that you might enjoy exploring!

I'd highly recommend watching "The Wackness" from 2008. It's a captivating thriller set in New York City during the summer of '94, featuring an eclectic cast including Method Man and Mary-Kate Olsen. The film follows a teenager selling marijuana to his psychotherapist while navigating teenage romance - quite an intriguing blend!

If you're up for something a bit darker with intense characters, "The Devil's Rejects" might also be worth checking out. It tells the story of a murderous family on the run from law enforcement, starring iconic horror actors such as Sid Haig and Bill Moseley. Enjoy your cinematic journey!

It features Bruce Willis reprising his iconic role as John McClane, this time teaming up with a Harlem store owner to stop a terrorist in New York City. Another film that might appeal to you is 'The Dark Knight,' where Heath Ledger delivers an unforgettable performance as the Joker, challenging Batman in one of the darkest chapters of Gotham's history. Both movies offer thrilling action and captivating plots. Enjoy!

Both "Odd Thomas" and "The Usual Suspects" might be intriguing choices for you!

"Odd Thomas", a supernatural thriller, follows a clairvoyant short-order cook who uses his abilities to help the police solve crimes, while also dealing with mysterious dark forces. The film stars Anton Yelchin and Ashley Johnson.

On the other hand, "The Usual Suspects" is a classic neo-noir crime thriller that tells the story of a group of criminals brought together by chance and their subsequent involvement in a complex plot involving organized crime, drugs, and terrorism. Notable actors include Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, and Chazz Palminteri.

Both films offer engaging plots and compelling performances that should appeal to fans of the thriller genre!

conversation.text: It seems like you're in for some thrilling movies! Given your preference for a 2008 thriller and intriguing plot, I'd highly recommend "Face/Off". This film stars action veterans John Travolta and Nicolas Cage, and it revolves around an intense battle between a seasoned FBI agent and a dangerous criminal who swap identities. If you're open to exploring outside of the 2008 timeframe, "The Sixth Sense" from 1999 is another captivating thriller that stars Bruce Willis as a child psychologist encountering unexplained mysteries. Both movies are sure to keep you on the edge of your seat!
